about_the_game:
It's a simple puzzle game about placing iceberg tiles on hexagonal sea tiles.
Click on an iceberg to freely place it on the sea, but make sure to keep the icebergs apart from each other.

90+ Levels
The game offers 90+ handcrafted levels
A variety of animals and mechanics make the puzzles engaging.

Adorable Animals
Meet cute polar bears, penguins, walruses, and orcas.
Place the same animals within one tile of each other, but avoid placing them near the orcas.

Simple Controls
This game only requires clicking the left and right mouse buttons.
It's easy for anyone to pick up, from beginners of all ages to seasoned puzzle enthusiasts.
